channel.title: Update on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Update on Home

item.title: Update 7.3*
item.description: Preliminary stats This page list statistics of battles fought during 7.3. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not career stats unless otherwise mentioned. In total, there were 184M battles recorded by 464k players.
